item.title: Cryptography in V
item.description: Synopsis: A short post, and part of a series of posts, which goes over some of the basic constructs of financial economics - in this case rate of return and present value. Rate of return Rate of return is also called effective interest rate. This is the change in value of an investment, divided by its initial value: $R = \frac{A(t_1)-A(t_0)}{A(t_0)}$ Case: “If my savings account has a present value of \$1000.
